Class GameDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.GameDAO
public class GameDAO extends Object
DAO class for managing Game entities in the database.

Provides CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for games associated with specific users. Uses ExceptionMessage to handle database-related errors.

Since:
3.3
Author:
Davitroon

  • Method Details

    • addGame

      public void addGame(Game game, int userId, Connection connection)
      Inserts a new game into the database.
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object to add.
      userId - the ID of the user creating the game.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • queryGame

      public ResultSet queryGame(int gameId, Connection connection)
      Retrieves a specific game by its ID.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game to query.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing the game's data, or null if an exception occurs.
      Since:
      3.3

    • queryGames

      public ResultSet queryGames(boolean onlyActive, int userId, Connection connection)
      Retrieves all games associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      onlyActive - if true, only active games are retrieved.
      userId - the ID of the user whose games are queried.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing the games data, or null if an exception occurs.
      Since:
      3.3

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame(Game game, Connection connection)
      Updates all data of a specific game in the database.
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object containing updated data.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • updateGameBalance

      public void updateGameBalance(Game game, Connection connection)
      Updates only the money pool of a specific game in the database.
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object containing the new money value.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • deleteGame

      public void deleteGame(int gameId, Connection connection)
      Deletes a specific game by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game to delete.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • deleteGames

      public void deleteGames(int userId, Connection connection)
      Deletes all games associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose games should be deleted.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3
